about_the_game:
Embark on a first person 2 players cooperative puzzle adventure where you and your friend work together to obtain your reliability certification as a brand new robot model from one of the most powerful intergalactic corporations.

Play as Bot and Tic as you solve puzzles and riddles in a quirky space-themed atmosphere with a retro vibe. Communication and learning what it takes to become the elite of assistant robots will be the key to your progress.

Try piloting a next-generation spaceship or finding your way through the vastness of the galaxy. Don't forget to master the fundamental basics of this world’s music or the proper way to tighten bolts…

Learn, adapt, and communicate to prove your worth.

Join TwinTies on their first adventure with Bot & Tic.
detailed_description:
Embark on a first person 2 players cooperative puzzle adventure where you and your friend work together to obtain your reliability certification as a brand new robot model from one of the most powerful intergalactic corporations.

Play as Bot and Tic as you solve puzzles and riddles in a quirky space-themed atmosphere with a retro vibe. Communication and learning what it takes to become the elite of assistant robots will be the key to your progress.

Try piloting a next-generation spaceship or finding your way through the vastness of the galaxy. Don't forget to master the fundamental basics of this world’s music or the proper way to tighten bolts…

Learn, adapt, and communicate to prove your worth.

Join TwinTies on their first adventure with Bot & Tic.
name: Bot & Tic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750TI or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PC, a microphone and a voice tchat software (Discord or equivalent)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PC, a microphone and a voice tchat software (Discord or equivalent)

short_description: A co-op space adventure packed with puzzles and brainteasers at every turn.
